name: The Great Escape (from America) (DEMO)
description:
The United States of America are doomed. There's just been another shooting, gas prices have soared and a new COVID variant is spreading. Upon seeing the news, Lily decides that she's had enough. She gets dressed and heads out on a quest across America to escape to Canada.

But it won't be easy for her. She will travel across treacherous mountains and through dangerous streets in order to escape. Will you be able to guide her through all the hazards of the USA?

For the first time, there's an assist mode in my game for new players. Use it if you get stuck.

Controls:
WASD/Arrow keys: Movement
X/Space: Jump
Z: In assist mode, place a checkpoint
P: Pause

And yes, this is partially a vent game.
